reviews.review: Molto bello.. ma il single player è un po' corto... 5 Ore o anche meno per finirlo. Meno male che poi ci sono le camere della comunità e il multiplayer cooperativo :-)

Muito Bom! Diversão garantida!  :-)

What can I say about Portal 2 that hasn't already been said a million times? It is a FANTASTIC game that improves upon EVERY aspect of the original Portal! It has a surprisingly engaging story, great characters who you actually care about, expertly written humor, great acting, and challenging gameplay that can be frustrating at times, but fun and stimulating! 

This game is also rich in content! You get a great single player campaign, a co-op mode that allows for great communication even without voice chat, and on top of that there is a built in level creator that allows for limitless content! If you haven't bought Portal 2 by now do yourself a favor and BUY IT! It is on sale quite frequently and is worth whatever price is listed honestly!

So go BUY IT! They are waiting for you...in the test chambeeerrrrr.
Absolution
Improves on the original game in every way.  Story, graphics, gameplay, mechanics, etc, they're all better in Portal 2.

love this agme
Fun fUn fuN! Its fun. if you liked portal then definitly get this. and if its cheap enough for you to consider buying it. buy it. plus there is the community made maps. there cool. did i mention fun?

Portal 2 is the sequel the original might haven't needed and it's proof that VALVe may not know how to count to three but you don't know how thankful I am for this game.

It expands the story and adds more character not only to, well, characters (even those with no dialogue) but to Aperture Laboratories as a whole. Test chambers are bigger and better and GLaDOS is stronger than ever. But Chell is not alone and always has a voice at her side, something I thought would be annoying but wasn't at all.

Some people said it was easier than the original but after playing Portal, its Advanced Test Chambers seemed easier than the simpler ones in the main story. So it's not that Portal 2 is easier, you are smarter (kudos to you), or at least have a better understanding of the game's mechanics.

Also: J. K. SIMMONS AS CAVE JOHNSON.

You could call Portal 2 "Backstory: The Game".
прыгай в дыры и стой как цапля

This game is awesome.  Great humor and gameplay. Hopefully there will be a #3.

If you like the original Portal game, you'll like this one. If you have no idea what Portal is, it's a platforming puzzle (and a bit of action) game in which you need to solve tests given to you. 

You are given a portal gun that shoots 2 portals in different colors, onto portal surfaces in order for these tests to be solved. The game also has lots of physics involved, but it is basic enough to understand, even if Portal 2 is the first game you play in the series.

The tests rise in difficulty as the game progresses and will make you think outside of the box. One main point about the tests, is that there really is no "right" way to solve them. The devs may have intentions for players to solve it one or multiple ways, which makes this game even more interesting.

If single-player mode is completed, you can move onto the co-op mode which has tons more tests to be solved, albeit with another person. In co-op mode, tests are not able to be completed by only one player.
Very good game, loved every bit of it.

Una idea original, un guion excepcional, (de verdad ke muy bueno), unos graficos explendidos con escenarios que te sumergen en el ambiente con un solo vistazo, una jugabilidad dinamica y divertida, puzzles de habilidad e ingenio con los que mas de una vez te pararas a pensar... como *%#! resuelvo esto! (sin embargo al final la solucion es bastante sencilla).
El modo cooperativo tambien es algo que le hace ganar muchos puntos si tienes con quien jugarlo.
Sin duda esta entre mis juegos preferidos, para mi... una obra maestra.  (sobretodo teniendo en cuenta su bajo precio)

Sin embargo... recomiendo jugar a portal y portal prelude (mod oficial del portal) previamente, y despues jugar a el portal 2.

So if you've not played the Portal series, you're missing out. Portal 1, an indie game gone viral was an amazing success due mostly in part to its amazing gameplay and the innovative use of physics using Portals to transport yourself and any objects you need to complete a series of puzzles. The game is narrated by an increasingly sinister computer, and you must think fast to survive the game. 

Portal 2 Brings back that winning formula, but adds amazing multiplayer, a custom level builder and a story that sees you teaming up with the evil computer GlaDoS!
Good thing I was wearing my seatbelt belt!
It's Portal 2.
Perfect!!
Os lo recomiendo, en este juego tendreis que pensar un poco mucho.

A worthy sequel to my favourite single-player game of all time.  The introduction of a new voice to annoy you (and the return of a favourite), plus more puzzling gels/surfaces/toys makes these levels quite challenging.  Also, multiplayer!

If Portal was an interesting experiment in the puzzle-solving genre, this is the full-blown OS update to the series. Hugely expanded over the first game but still plays as what you'd expect from Portal. Both co-op and single player modes are sublime and interesting. While it carries on story-wise from the first game, if you did start with this one, you can still figure out what's going on. Don't miss this one either!
If you like jokes and puzzles hope you like this game.

This is a must play game, and is, in my opinion, the best portal games yet!

How can you tun away a game with amazing gameplay physics, charming characters, and intelligently designed puzzles?

Una obra maestra. Los puzles son entretenidos y la historia es de lo mejor que se ha echo en los últimos años, llena de sorpresas hasta el final. El modo historia no es muy largo pero el cooperativo y los nieveles creados por otros usuarios alargan el juego considerablemente.

Un fuera de serie. Si la primera parte sorprendía de lo más, esta la supera en todos los sentidos. Parece mentida que a estas alturas un juego pueda llegar a sorprender tanto. Gráficos la mar de bonitos, voces simpáticas, duración considerable, curva de dificultad correctísima y diversión a raudales. Recomendado 100%

GLaDOS, endowed capricious temper, venomous sarcasm and passion for dangerous scientific experiments.

The heroine of Portal, a girl named Chell, long ago destroyed the insidious system and get out of the underground complex Aperture Labs, which was pulled back in a flash.

Chatty, slightly hysterical bot Wheatley, whose pleasant English accent belongs to the actor and producer Stephen Merchant, co-author of the cult TV series The Office. 

Cave Johnson, founder of Aperture Science. Demonstrating the flexible moral principles that would be envied Professor Farnsworth from "Futurama." 

And Valve do not forget to link a single thread "single" and "Co-op", and then - skillfully build a bridge to potential amendments. 

And all this cocktail - Portal 2 (brilliant, witty, filled with an amazing sense of taste and action Game!)

Portal 2 is -- simply put, a must play. Combining perfectly refined gameplay and some of the best written game dialogue I've ever heard, Quantum Tunneling has never been more fun! 

On one hand you have a nice length singleplayer that is sure to keep you on your toes, and once you're finished with that you have a ridiculous number of community test chambers to keep you busy.

Overall, this game will keep you happy for a fair old while.
A fantastic game, complete with great puzzles, co-op game play and steam workshop support. Even though this game is fairly old now, its still worth getting as new mods are being made all the time.

Неординарый пазл от первого лица, который хорош уже благодаря отличному сюжету для однопользовательского прохожреня, но дает возможность так же пройти серию испытаний с другом в кооп. 
(абсолютно полная поддержка геймпада дает возможность играть даже в двоем на одном компе SplitScreen!)

И вот после (а можно и до) триумфального прохождения игры в доль и в поперек, нам дают возможность создавать уровни самому! 
В этом действительно простом и удобном редакторе за щитаные минуты может разобратся любой человек! 
Делай свои уровни, делись ими, загружай с воркшопа уровни своих друзей.... веселье не закончится никогда)))
Pretty good fun with your SO. Might sleep on the couch after each session.
